str_actions_desc_1.name: {"es":"","en":""}
str_actions_desc_1.value: {"es":"operaciones que se pueden realizar sobre cualquiera de los accesos. Por defecto, hay cuatro acciones:","en":"operation that can be made over any of the available acceses. There are four actions by default:"}

str_actions_desc_2.name: {"es":"","en":""}
str_actions_desc_2.value: {"es":"pero se pueden crear m\u00e1s (uso orientado m\u00e1s a desarrolladores).","en":"but can be created more."}

str_admin_terms_desc_1.name: {"es":"","en":""}
str_admin_terms_desc_1.value: {"es":"en la secci\u00f3n \"T\u00e9rminos\" (subsecci\u00f3n de","en":"in the section \"Terms\" (sub-section of"}

str_admin_terms_desc_11.name: {"es":"","en":""}
str_admin_terms_desc_11.value: {"es":"es el codigo asociado al t\u00e9rmino, editable en la interfaz mencionada m\u00e1s arriba. Puede revisar las vistas para verificarlo.","en":"is the code associated to the term. It can be checked in the views"}

str_admin_terms_desc_3.name: {"es":"","en":""}
str_admin_terms_desc_3.value: {"es":"se puede administrar la biblioteca de los mismos asociados a cada secci\u00f3n. Al instalar el sistema ya existe un conjunto predeterminado de t\u00e9rminos con las traducciones correspondientes a los idiomas disponibles. B\u00e1sicamente todo el texto que se ve en la interfaz est\u00e1 disponible en otros idiomas (especificados en la instalaci\u00f3n), y solo es cuesti\u00f3n de cambiarlo con un solo click (en la parte superior, la opci\u00f3n de \"Configuraciones\"), o editar la biblioteca de t\u00e9rminos a conveniencia.","en":"can be managed the set of terms associated with each section. After installing the system there is already a terms set by default with their translations to each one of the languages available in the system. In other words, all the text seen in the interface can be availabe in other languages as well, The navigation language can be changed in the top section, clicking \"Settings\", or editing the translations in the corresponding access."}

str_admin_terms_desc_4.name: {"es":"","en":""}
str_admin_terms_desc_4.value: {"es":"Para editar los t\u00e9rminos de una secci\u00f3n, haga click en el enlace de la secci\u00f3n (esto mientras est\u00e9 navegando en el acceso","en":"To edit the terms of a section or access (are synonymous here), click the section link (do this when you are navigating in the access"}

str_admin_terms_desc_5.name: {"es":"","en":""}
str_admin_terms_desc_5.value: {"es":"Se desplegar\u00e1 un modal con todos los t\u00e9rminos disponibles para esa secci\u00f3n. El texto que se muestra en la interfaz final es el de la columna \"Valor\", y recomendamos no cambiar el texto de la columna \"C\u00f3digo\".","en":"A modal or lightbox will be shown with all the terms availables for that section. The text shown in the final interface can be located in the column \"Value\",  and it's rcommended not changing the text of the column \"Code\"."}

str_admin_terms_desc_6.name: {"es":"","en":""}
str_admin_terms_desc_6.value: {"es":"Como se ha mencionado m\u00e1s arriba, cada acceso posee una vista asociada, en un archivo","en":"Each access has a view associated, in a file"}

str_admin_terms_desc_8.name: {"es":"","en":""}
str_admin_terms_desc_8.value: {"es":"Y en esa vista hay disponible un array","en":"That view has an array"}

str_admin_terms_desc_9.name: {"es":"","en":""}
str_admin_terms_desc_9.value: {"es":"que almacena cada uno de los t\u00e9rminos multi-linguistico disponibles en esa secci\u00f3n, siendo renderizado en el idioma en el que el usuario est\u00e9 navegando (y siempre cuando la traducci\u00f3n haya sido cargada previamente y correctamente). Este proceso se realiza de la siguiente manera:","en":"that stores each one of multilingual terms availables in that section, being rendered in navigation language of the user (it is assuming the respective translation has been loaded correctly). This process happens the next:"}

str_dev_desc_1.name: {"es":"","en":""}
str_dev_desc_1.value: {"es":"Las vistas cuando el usuario no est\u00e1 logueado se encuentran en la carpeta","en":"The views used when the user is not logged are in the folder"}

str_dev_desc_11.name: {"es":"","en":""}
str_dev_desc_11.value: {"es":"se encuentran los archivos de t\u00e9rminos multilinguisticos. Uno por seccion. Preferiblemente no editarlos directamente.","en":"are the multilingual files. It is recommended not edit them."}

str_dev_desc_12.name: {"es":"","en":""}
str_dev_desc_12.value: {"es":"contiene las funciones principales de javascript, asociadas al sistema de administraci\u00f3n.","en":"has the main javascript functions, associated with the admin-panel."}

str_dev_desc_13.name: {"es":"","en":""}
str_dev_desc_13.value: {"es":"contiene un fichero por cada acceso existente. Estos ficheros son llamados desde cada una de las vistas, asi que no es un formato restrictivo tener un fichero por cada vista.","en":"has a file for each access."}

str_dev_desc_14.name: {"es":"","en":""}
str_dev_desc_14.value: {"es":"contiene en su mayoria los procesadores de los modales de creaci\u00f3n de items.","en":"has the creators of items."}

str_dev_desc_15.name: {"es":"","en":""}
str_dev_desc_15.value: {"es":"Los modelos se encuentran en la ruta","en":"Models are in the route"}

str_dev_desc_16.name: {"es":"","en":""}
str_dev_desc_16.value: {"es":"Puedes usar las funciones corrientes de Eloquent.","en":"You can use the Eloquent methods."}

str_dev_desc_18.name: {"es":"","en":""}
str_dev_desc_18.value: {"es":"No borrar el archivo","en":"Don't delete the file"}

str_dev_desc_2.name: {"es":"","en":""}
str_dev_desc_2.value: {"es":"siendo el archivo raiz","en":"being the root file"}

str_dev_desc_21.name: {"es":"","en":""}
str_dev_desc_21.value: {"es":"No remover archivos de constantes","en":"Don't remove constants files"}

str_dev_desc_22.name: {"es":"","en":""}
str_dev_desc_22.value: {"es":"Cualquier error acontecido en el sistema es verificable en el archivo","en":"Any error could be verified in the log file"}

str_dev_desc_23.name: {"es":"","en":""}
str_dev_desc_23.value: {"es":"La configuraci\u00f3n de base de datos se puede verificar en","en":"The database configuration can be checked in"}

str_dev_desc_3.name: {"es":"","en":""}
str_dev_desc_3.value: {"es":"Las vistas cuando el usuario est\u00e1 logueado se encuentran en la carpeta","en":"Views used when the user is logged-in are in the folder"}

str_dev_desc_4.name: {"es":"","en":""}
str_dev_desc_4.value: {"es":"siendo el archivo raiz","en":"being the root file"}

str_dev_desc_5.name: {"es":"","en":""}
str_dev_desc_5.value: {"es":"La vista de pantalla bloqueada es","en":"The  lock-screen view is"}

str_dev_desc_6.name: {"es":"","en":""}
str_dev_desc_6.value: {"es":"Las vistas de las secciones\/accesos estan en","en":"Views of acceses are in"}

str_dev_desc_7.name: {"es":"","en":""}
str_dev_desc_7.value: {"es":"contiene los modales llamados de manera dinamica con peticiones AJAX, y procesados con la funcion","en":"has the modals or lightboxes called dinamically with AJAX and processed in the backend with the functions"}

str_dev_desc_9.name: {"es":"","en":""}
str_dev_desc_9.value: {"es":"Los archivos .js ubicarlos en","en":"Put Javascript files in"}

str_if_you_dev.name: {"es":"","en":""}
str_if_you_dev.value: {"es":"Si eres desarrollador, haz click","en":"If you are developer, click"}

str_if_you_dev_1.name: {"es":"","en":""}
str_if_you_dev_1.value: {"es":"Por cada acceso existe una plantilla","en":"For each access there is a template"}

str_if_you_dev_10.name: {"es":"","en":""}
str_if_you_dev_10.value: {"es":"Este metodo, entre otras acciones, colecta todo los terminos de idioma","en":"This method get all the terms"}

str_if_you_dev_12.name: {"es":"","en":""}
str_if_you_dev_12.value: {"es":"con los que este navegando el usuario y los pasa como parametros a la vista correspondiente, esto con los permisos que el usuario posea sobre ese acceso.","en":"with the language that the user is using to navigate and pass it as a parameter to the corresponding view."}

str_if_you_dev_13.name: {"es":"","en":""}
str_if_you_dev_13.value: {"es":"Los t\u00e9rminos se encuentra en el array","en":"The terms are in the array"}

str_if_you_dev_14.name: {"es":"","en":""}
str_if_you_dev_14.value: {"es":"Los permisos est\u00e1n en el array asociativo","en":"The permises (based in the user's role) are in the associative array"}

str_if_you_dev_15.name: {"es":"","en":""}
str_if_you_dev_15.value: {"es":"Las claves son las acciones, y cada una indexa un valor booleano, que indica si el usuario, con el rol asignado, puede o no realizar esa accion.","en":"The keys are the actions, and each one of them reference a boolean value, indicating if the user with the asignated role, can make an action or not."}

str_if_you_dev_16.name: {"es":"","en":""}
str_if_you_dev_16.value: {"es":"Se retorna la vista renderizada al cliente.","en":"It is retorned the renderized view to the client"}

str_if_you_dev_2.name: {"es":"","en":""}
str_if_you_dev_2.value: {"es":"que se pueden visualizar en la ruta","en":"that can be checked in the route"}

str_if_you_dev_3.name: {"es":"","en":""}
str_if_you_dev_3.value: {"es":"Las vistas estan nombradas con el codigo del acceso. Este mismo codigo es el que se visualiza como el ultimo slug en la url.","en":"The views have as name the code of the access. This code is the last slug in the url."}

str_if_you_dev_4.name: {"es":"","en":""}
str_if_you_dev_4.value: {"es":"Cada vez que se hace click en uno de los items del menu lateral, ocurre el siguiente proceso:","en":"Everytime we click one of the items of the side menu, the next happens:"}

str_if_you_dev_5.name: {"es":"","en":""}
str_if_you_dev_5.value: {"es":"Se genera una petici\u00f3n al endpoint","en":"It's generated a request to the endpoint"}

str_if_you_dev_6.name: {"es":"","en":""}
str_if_you_dev_6.value: {"es":"El endpoint anterior es manejado por el controlador","en":"The last endpoint is handled by the controller"}

str_if_you_dev_7.name: {"es":"","en":""}
str_if_you_dev_7.value: {"es":"los controladores se encuentran en la ruta","en":"the controllers are in the route"}

str_if_you_dev_9.name: {"es":"","en":""}
str_if_you_dev_9.value: {"es":"ver archivo routes.php, en la ruta","en":"check the file routes.php in the route"}

str_inactivity_timelimit.name: {"es":"","en":""}
str_inactivity_timelimit.value: {"es":"Tiempo m\u00e1ximo de inactividad para cerrar sesi\u00f3n o bloquear pantalla","en":"Inactivity time-limit (for logout or lock screen)"}

str_languages_desc_1.name: {"es":"","en":""}
str_languages_desc_1.value: {"es":"puedes crear nuevas idiomas, y administrar la biblioteca de t\u00e9rminos de los idiomas ya existentes.","en":"you can create new languages, and manage the terms library of the pre-loaded languages"}

str_roles_desc_1.name: {"es":"","en":""}
str_roles_desc_1.value: {"es":"como dijimos antes, es la asociacion a cada una de las secciones de un conjunto de acciones.","en":"a role is the association of a set of actions to every access available on the system."}

str_roles_system_desc_1.name: {"es":"","en":""}
str_roles_system_desc_1.value: {"es":"un rol es una conjunto de funcionalidades sobre cada acceso del sistema que un usuario puede tener o no tener. Por ejemplo, un usuario con rol de","en":"a role is a set of funcionalities over each access of the system that an user could have or not. For instance, an user with a role of"}

str_roles_system_desc_2.name: {"es":"","en":""}
str_roles_system_desc_2.value: {"es":"puede tener permisos de","en":"can have permises to"}

str_roles_system_desc_3.name: {"es":"","en":""}
str_roles_system_desc_3.value: {"es":"sobre todos los accesos, y otro usuario con rol de","en":"over all the accesses, and another user with a role of"}

str_roles_system_desc_4.name: {"es":"","en":""}
str_roles_system_desc_4.value: {"es":"puede tener solo permisos de","en":"could have only permises to"}

str_sections_desc_1.name: {"es":"","en":""}
str_sections_desc_1.value: {"es":"el conjunto de accesos existentes en el sistema, y visualizables en el men\u00fa lateral.","en":"the set of accesses of the system that can be seen in the side menu"}

str_sending_new_password.name: {"es":"","en":""}
str_sending_new_password.value: {"es":"Enviando nueva contrase\u00f1a aleatoria al correo del usuario","en":"Sending a random new password to the user"}

str_session_duration_timelimit.name: {"es":"","en":""}
str_session_duration_timelimit.value: {"es":"Tiempo m\u00e1ximo de duraci\u00f3n de sesion","en":"Session duration time-limit"}

str_statuses_desc_1.name: {"es":"","en":""}
str_statuses_desc_1.value: {"es":"es una etiqueta de libre creaci\u00f3n, a la que se le asocia un codigo unico, y con la cual un item puede ser marcado (entiendase por item un Usuario, un Cliente, etc). As\u00ed, se puede tener como status \"Habilitado\" e \"Inhabilitado\", entre otros creados por alguien con el rol adecuado.","en":"it is a tag that can be created by an administrator, that has an unique code, and an item can be tagged with it."}

str_through_link.name: {"es":"","en":""}
str_through_link.value: {"es":"A trav\u00e9s de un link enviado al correo del usuario","en":"Through a link sent to the email of the user"}
